nodes.text: Light and Dark is the third adventure in the Child of Light saga written by Lee Pickler and released by the RPGA on behalf of Wizards of the Coast.

In a distant corner of the galaxy, hidden behind a nearly impenetrable nebula, lies an ancient Sith temple. And Thaum Rystra. Now you must stop him before he can unleash the terror of the Sith on the Galaxy. The conclusion of the Child of Light saga. An adventure for high-level heroes.
